subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- Five U.S. soldiers have been killed and three others are missing after an attack 12 miles west of Mahmoudiya, Iraq, the U.S. military says.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

>+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
It's a side of war reporting rarely seen. Michael Holmes puts
a human face on the casualties of war and shares his personal,
behind-the-scenes account of life in Iraq through the eyes of a
journalist. Watch CNN SIU: Month of Mayhem Saturday and Sunday
at 8 and 11 p.m. ET.
http://www.cnn.com/CNN/Programs/siu/shows/month.of.mayhem/index.html
